Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Morgan
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Morgan due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Morgan due to police activity. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#21 Cermak

#9 Ashland

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
